content:
It’s the first day back at work for many people so to break you into the daily grind as gently as possible we thought we’d offer you something that isn’t too taxing. Well, we figured you wouldn't want to have to think too much. And for those poor people feeling already overwhelmed, especially if it’s the first time you’ve used your brain for two weeks, give yourself a five minute break and get a load of these 
. 
Some of them are just too cute for their own good, others are just plain funny. Either way, they'll be sure to put a smile on your face for the rest of the afternoon.
Read the rest of the article at 
.
title: Funny Animal Pictures
author: Linda
